divs: Sighting DetailsI was travling south on US31 in Tipton Co. I noticed what I thought was a plane to the southwest. It was travling northeast. Mabye about a 1000 ft up. The light was white, and I kept looking for the flashing lights like on a plane. As I watched, it crossed right over my car still heading northeast, and I still couldn't see any lights blinking. I had my camera and wanted to get a picture. So I pulled over to the east on a county road, got out of the car, and it was gone. It was twlight out, and the sky was totally clear. It was just gone. I thought if it was a plane, I could have still seen it. The whole thing only lasted mabye 3-5 minutes, but I stayed out in the country another 20 minutes watching the sky in case it re-appeared. But I didn't see anything else. I'm reporting this, just in case someone else saw it too, and will know what it was, or come forward with more information.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sharpsville
There were no other sightings in Sharpsville on or around March 26th 2010
Summary: White light, thought it was a plane at first, but it dissapeared
